quest.name: When Yugiri Met the Fraternity
journal: Zanthael has orders to point you in the direction of the Lominsan underworld.

Zanthael gives you a letter of introduction from Merlwyb, which should grant Yugiri access to the Lominsan underworld. Take the letter to the southern area of the lower decks, and show it to the inconspicuous man.

Despite Zanthael's earlier warnings, the inconspicuous man extends Yugiri the warmest of Lominsan welcomes. Duly heartened, she declares her intent to study the fighting techniques employed by his fraternity, and expresses her hope that you will be her student when the time is ripe.
objectives: Deliver the Admiral's letter of introduction to the inconspicuous man.

dialogue.name: ZANTHAEL
dialogue.text: The Admiral has informed me of the arrangement. I have in my keeping a letter of introduction for Lady Yugiri.

dialogue.name: ZANTHAEL
dialogue.text: To the south stands a gate leading to a pier for smaller fishing vessels. Look for an inconspicuous Hyuran man there, and present the letter to him. He serves as a gatekeeper of sorts.

dialogue.name: ZANTHAEL
dialogue.text: Now, before you go, I am obliged to remind you that the members of the, ahem, fraternity to which you would be introduced abide in the shadows of Lominsan society.

dialogue.name: ZANTHAEL
dialogue.text: They value their independence more highly than pirates, and are united by a bond stronger than mythril. To wit, they are invariably wary of new faces.

dialogue.name: ZANTHAEL
dialogue.text: Though it be penned by the Admiral herself, mere words on parchment will get you only so far into their confidence. You must work for every onze of trust they place in you.

dialogue.name: ZANTHAEL
dialogue.text: But here is the letter. Go to the aforementioned place, and show it to the aforementioned man. Oh, and...good luck.

dialogue.name: UNDERGROUNDB01362
dialogue.text: What? Didn't your mammy teach you it's rude to stare?

dialogue.name: UNDERGROUNDA01362
dialogue.text: ...Hm? Got business with me, 'venturer?

dialogue.name: UNDERGROUNDA01362
dialogue.text: So you're the womanman the Admiral sent word of.

dialogue.name: UNDERGROUNDA01362
dialogue.text: I was hopin' I might catch a glimpse of Thancred, too─been a while since I saw his shite-eatin' grin. But what with all the doe–eyed wenches about, I 'spect he's got his hands full.

dialogue.name: UNDERGROUNDA01362
dialogue.text: Ah, and you must be the Far Easterner what Merlwyb says wants to train with us. Welcome to Limsa, milady!

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I am Yugiri of Doma. 'Tis an honor to make your acquaintance.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I must confess, when first I learned of your organization, I had certain...preconceptions as to the nature of your membership. It would seem I was mistaken.

dialogue.name: UNDERGROUNDA01362
dialogue.text: You're not the first person to say that, lass. Limsa's a city of pirates, to be sure, and pirates don't give two farts about keepin' a spotless reputation. They hardly need a secret society to do their dirty work.

dialogue.name: UNDERGROUNDA01362
dialogue.text: Might be as my people and I keep to the shadows, but we've got nothin' to be ashamed of. It's simply better for business that we remain unseen.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: And so you have developed fighting techniques suited to this purpose. I see. Know that the practitioners of my art, too, are denizens of shadow. 'Tis in stealth that our strength lies. There is much we might learn from one another, I think.

dialogue.name: UNDERGROUNDA01362
dialogue.text: Then what in the seven hells are we waitin' for? If you'd come with us, Yugerry of Do–whatsit, we can get acquainted in more private surrounds... Hah, that didn't come out right, did it!?

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: LadyMaster Forename. I shall remain with these people for a time, that I might study their ways.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Though I am loath to be separated from my countrymen, I take solace in the knowledge that they are in the best of hands.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: You have been a true friend to us Domans. No words would suffice to express my gratitude.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Ere long, I hope to begin imparting my martial knowledge to the people of Eorzea. When that time comes, it would be my honor to welcome you as a student.
